title: Observations
description: Table with observations based on the multimedia files. Associated with deployments (`deploymentID`), sequences (`sequenceID`) and optionally individual multimedia files (`multimediaID`). Observations can mark non-animal events (camera setup, human, blank) or one or more animal observations (`observationType` = `animal`) of a certain taxon, count, age, sex, behaviour and/or individual.

fields.name: observationID
fields.description: Unique identifier (within a project) of the observation.

fields.name: deploymentID
fields.description: Unique identifier of the deployment this observation belongs to. Foreign key to `deployment:deploymentID`.

fields.name: sequenceID
fields.description: Unique identifier of the sequence (collection of multimedia files grouped by a predefined `sequenceInterval`) that is the source of this observation. Foreign key to `multimedia:sequenceID`.

fields.name: multimediaID
fields.description: Unique identifier of the multimedia file that is the source of this observation. Foreign key to `multimedia:multimediaID`. Include but leave empty for sequence-based observations.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Date and time of the observation, as an ISO 8601 formatted string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm`). For file-based observations this is the `timestamp` of the associated multimedia file (in `multimediaID`), for sequence-based observations the `timestamp` of the first multimedia file in the associated sequence (in `sequenceID`).

fields.name: observationType
fields.description: Type of observation. All categories in this vocabulary have to be understandable from an AI point of view. `unknown` describes classifications with a confidence level below some predefined threshold i.e. neither humans nor AI can say what was recorded.

fields.name: sensorMethod
fields.description: Method of triggering the camera for this observation.

fields.name: cameraSetup
fields.description: `true` if this observation is part of the camera setup process (camera deployment, pickup, maintenance).

fields.name: taxonID
fields.description: Unique identifier of the `scientificName` according to the taxonomic reference list defined by `taxonIDReference` in the data package metadata.

fields.name: scientificName
fields.description: Scientific name of the observed individual(s).

fields.name: count
fields.description: Number of observed individuals (optionally of given age, sex and behaviour).

fields.name: countNew
fields.description: Number of new (= previously uncounted) individuals in the associated multimedia file (`multimediaID`) taking into account the entire sequence (`sequenceID`) (optionally of given age, sex and behaviour).

fields.name: age
fields.description: Age of observed individual(s)

fields.name: sex
fields.description: Sex of observed individual(s)

fields.name: behaviour
fields.description: Dominant behaviour of observed individual(s), ideally expressed as controlled values (e.g. grazing, browsing, rooting, vigilance, running, walking). A combination of dominant (first) and additional behaviours can be expressed as as a pipe (`|`) separated list.

fields.name: individualID
fields.description: Unique identifier (within a project) of the observed individual.

fields.name: classificationMethod
fields.description: Classification method.

fields.name: classifiedBy
fields.description: Name or unique identifier of the person or AI algorithm that classified this observation.

fields.name: classificationTimestamp
fields.description: Date and time of the classification, as an ISO 8601 formatted string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm`).

fields.name: classificationConfidence
fields.description: Accuracy confidence of the classification. Expressed as a probability, with `1` being maximum confidence. Provide an approximate value for human classifications.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Comments or notes about the observation.

fields.name: _id
fields.description: Internal attribute of data management system: ID of this observation.
